mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.table_id AS "table.id", a.column_name AS "columnName", a.column_comment AS "columnComment", a.column_type AS "columnType", a.table_status AS "tableStatus", a.is_required AS "isRequired", a.is_show AS "isShow", a.is_process AS "isProcess", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.control_type_id AS "controlTypeId", a.is_audit AS "isAudit", a.audit_post AS "auditPost", a.sort AS "sort", r.name AS "auditPostName"
LEFT JOIN oa_person_define_table b ON b.id = a.table_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = a.audit_post JOIN all_tab_cols t ON t.column_name = upper(a.column_name) and t.table_name = upper(b.table_name)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_person_define_table_column( id, table_id, column_name, column_comment, column_type, table_status, is_required, is_show, is_process, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, control_type_id, is_audit, sort, audit_post ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{table.id}, #{columnName}, #{columnComment}, #{columnType}, #{tableStatus}, #{isRequired}, #{isShow}, #{isProcess}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{controlTypeId}, #{isAudit}, #{sort}, #{auditPost} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_person_define_table_column SET table_id = #{table.id}, column_name = #{columnName}, column_comment = #{columnComment}, column_type = #{columnType}, table_status = #{tableStatus}, is_required = #{isRequired}, is_show = #{isShow}, is_process = #{isProcess}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, control_type_id = #{controlTypeId}, is_audit = #{isAudit}, sort = #{sort}, audit_post = #{auditPost} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:

FROM oa_person_define_table_column a
WHERE a.table_id = #{tableId} and a.del_flag = '0' order by a.sort
